articles.title: The world's fastest supercomputer identified chemicals that could stop coronavirus from spreading, a crucial step toward a vaccine - CNN
articles.description: IBM's Summit supercomputer identified 77 drug compounds that could stop the coronavirus spike from infecting host cells. This could help scientists create the most effective vaccine.
